Activity: Log in and check emails. Gather all necessary resources for prototype development.
Develop the prototype for one of the key user interaction features, focusing on functionality.
Take a break and browse game development websites for inspiration and techniques.
Continue developing the prototype, emphasizing user experience and interaction flows.
Conduct a quick usability test of the prototype with a few colleagues to gather initial feedback.
Compile feedback received from the usability test and identify areas for improvement.
Revise the prototype based on feedback and ensure it aligns with user interaction goals.
Send an email to @ldes-1 and @sdes-1 sharing the prototype and gathering further input.
